page.title: 10BRIGHSTONE DOCTOR
page.content: The village has its own practice with the surgery situated so close to the church and graveyard that the doctors are tired of the jokes about it. Each morning is given over to time at the surgery. The doctors see patients by appointment only. After this any necessary house calls are made and this means that the doctor must have flexible lunch arrangements! The afternoons are taken up by more calls to sick patients or else by special clinics. For example the ante_natal clinc is on Wednesday afternoon. To help the partners at the practice a answer_phone has been installed but at present this high technology is proving to be faulty!
